verses.roman:
eta kahi kahe prabhu,--"śuna, sanātana
kṛṣṇa--baḍa dayāmaya, patita-pāvana

synonyms: eta kahi—saying this; kahe—continued to speak; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śuna—please hear; sanātana—My dear Sanātana; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; baḍa—very much; dayā-maya—merciful; patita-pāvana—deliverer of the fallen souls.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu continued, "My dear Sanātana, please hear from Me. Kṛṣṇa is very merciful, and He is the deliverer of all fallen souls.
